textBox.richText: They say a beautiful thing isn’t perfect... The quivering lip bubbles above the face of the wave It is ready to leap and crash onto the water in its wake It is then and there that time seems to halt As if God himself takes a moment to admire his creation Its crevices and curves, The textures of sands and shells trapped in its walls, Shades of rich deep blue gently faded into playful sea green, And finally, a web of pure white sea foam woven carefully on the surface. Each wave is unique, just like a snowflake The possibilities are limitless And there can be no right or wrong Undeniably, waves are both beautiful and perfect
